page.title: 14COUNTRY CHILDREN,ST.ALLEN.
page.content: Helen,10,Sarah,8,Kate,6,&Charles,4,of Tretherres,attend Archbishop Benson C. of E.Primary School 4\ miles away in Truro,& will probably go to Penair Comprehensive School at 11yrs.They also go to Truro for swimming club, Weds.evening & Sat.morning; piano lessons;tennis club;weekly Brownie meetings & monthly Church parade;& have many friends in Truro,so depend on parents for car transport. They meet friends from nearby farms at St. Allen Church on Sundays.Exchanging weekend visits with friends is popular.Brownies enjoyed Pack-Holiday at Gulval in April & an evening at Tretherres this summer.Fast traffic on narrow lanes,& attacks on children make parents wary of allowing them out walking alone;they are rather isolated at home,but compensated by their many activities & pleasant environment.
